text.content: Sometimes I need to remember just to breathe  Sometimes I need you to stay away from me  Sometimes I'm in disbelief, I didn't know  Somehow I need you to go    Don't stay  Forget our memories  Forget our possibilities  What you were changing me into  (Just give me myself back and)  Don't stay  Forget our memories  Forget our possibilities  Take all your faithlessness with you  (Just give me myself back and)  Don't stay    Sometimes I feel like I trusted you too well  Sometimes I just feel like screaming at myself  Sometimes I'm in disbelief, I didn't know  Somehow I need to be alone    Don't stay  Forget our memories  Forget our possibilities  What you were changing me into  (Just give me myself back and)  Don't stay  Forget our memories  Forget our possibilities  Take all your faithlessness with you  (Just give me myself back and)  Don't stay    I don't need you anymore, don't want to be ignored  I don't need one more day, of you wasting me away  I don't need you anymore, I don't want to be ignored  I don't need one more day, of you wasting me away  (With no apologies)    Don't stay  Forget our memories  Forget our possibilities  What you were changing me into  (Just give me myself back and)  Don't stay  Forget our
memories  Forget our possibilities  Take all your faithlessness with you  (Just give me myself back control)  Don't stay  Don't stay  Don't stay
